Automate Simulated Stone Mold Production

Mitech developed a production line layout and component designs to support automated production of molds to replace fully manual production. The new line included cure ovens and an intelligent conveyor system to shorten mold production time from weeks to less than two days. Automation significantly reduced floor space usage and operator handling.

Mitech Systems, Ltd.

Mechanical Engineering/Machine Design
